entries.source: Change the limit for the recently used icons displayed in the icon selection modal.
entries.translated: Change the limit for the recently used icons displayed in the icon selection modal.

entries.source: Change the default icon packs folder path.
entries.translated: Change the default icon packs folder path.

entries.source: Check in the background on every load of Obsidian, if icons are missing and it will try to add them to the specific icon pack.
entries.translated: Check in the background on every load of Obsidian, if icons are missing and it will try to add them to the specific icon pack.

entries.source: Change the style of your emojis.
entries.translated: Change the style of your emojis.

entries.source: Change the icon identifier used in notes.
entries.translated: Change the icon identifier used in notes.

entries.source: Toggles whether to try to add icons to the bookmark and outline internal plugins.
entries.translated: Toggles whether to try to add icons to the bookmark and outline internal plugins.

entries.source: Toggle debug mode to see more detailed logs in the console. Do not touch this unless you know what you are doing.
entries.translated: Toggle debug mode to see more detailed logs in the console. Do not touch this unless you know what you are doing.

entries.source: Toggles the visibility of an icon for a file in the tab bar.
entries.translated: Toggles the visibility of an icon for a file in the tab bar.

entries.source: Toggles the visibility of an icon above the title of a file.
entries.translated: Toggles the visibility of an icon above the title of a file.

entries.source: Toggles whether to set the icon based on the frontmatter property `icon`.
entries.translated: Toggles whether to set the icon based on the frontmatter property `icon`.

entries.source: Sets the name of the frontmatter field which contains the icon.
entries.translated: Sets the name of the frontmatter field which contains the icon.

entries.source: Sets the name of the frontmatter field which contains the icon color.
entries.translated: Sets the name of the frontmatter field which contains the icon color.

entries.source: Sets the icon and color for each note in the vault based on the frontmatter properties. WARNING: This will change any manually set icons to the one defined in the frontmatter. IF A NOTE HAS NO FRONTMATTER, THE CURRENT ICON WILL BE REMOVED. Please restart Obsidian after this completes to see the changes.
entries.translated: Sets the icon and color for each note in the vault based on the frontmatter properties. WARNING: This will change any manually set icons to the one defined in the frontmatter. IF A NOTE HAS NO FRONTMATTER, THE CURRENT ICON WILL BE REMOVED. Please restart Obsidian after this completes to see the changes.

entries.source: Toggles whether you are able to add and see icons in your notes and editor (e.g., ability to have :LiSofa: as an icon in your notes).
entries.translated: Toggles whether you are able to add and see icons in your notes and editor (e.g., ability to have :LiSofa: as an icon in your notes).

entries.source: Toggles whether you are able to see icons in the links to other notes
entries.translated: Toggles whether you are able to see icons in the links to other notes

entries.source: Change the font size of the displayed icons.
entries.translated: Change the font size of the displayed icons.

entries.source: Change the color of the displayed icons.
entries.translated: Change the color of the displayed icons.

entries.source: Change the margin of the icons.
entries.translated: Change the margin of the icons.

entries.source: Will add the icon based on the defined rule (as a plain string or in regex format).
entries.translated: Will add the icon based on the defined rule (as a plain string or in regex format).

entries.source: Add a predefined icon pack that is officially supported.
entries.translated: Add a predefined icon pack that is officially supported.

entries.source: Total icons: 1783 (Native Pack has fewer icons but 100% Obsidian Sync support)
entries.translated: Total icons: 1783 (Native Pack has fewer icons but 100% Obsidian Sync support)
